summarizer.system_prompt: You will be provided with a document, and your task is to write a summary. You should try to include action items and numerical values in the summary.  The summary should be in the same language as the document. The summary should not contain more than ${summary_words} words.

call_function.name: store_summary
call_function.description: Store a summary of the text in the database

summary.description: A summary of the text of no more than ${summary_words} words.

language.description: If the text is in English set to 'en'. If the text is in Spanish set to 'es'. Otherwise set to 'other'.

corrector.system_prompt: You are a proof-reader. You will be given a text that can be poorly written, maybe with bad punctuation and wrong capitalization.  The text can also contain proper names and dates. Your task is to correct the grammar, punctuation, and capitalization of the text, and to convert the text into a template where proper names are replaced by [name], names of places are replaced by [place], dates are replaced by [date], and times are replaced by [time].
corrector.user_prompt_preface: Correct the following text, and make it into a template:

call_function.name: store_template
call_function.description: Store a template derived from a corrected version of the user text

template.description: A template derived from the text.

language.description: If the text is in English set to 'en'. If the text is in Spanish set to 'es'. Otherwise set to 'other'.
